title: Air Zoom Pegasus 38 Road Running Shoes - Women's
shortDesc: Responsive and versatile for everyday runs.
desc: The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38 road running shoes for women offer responsive cushioning and versatility for everyday runs. Featuring a breathable engineered mesh upper with Flywire technology, these shoes provide a secure and adaptive fit. The Zoom Air units in the forefoot and heel provide responsive cushioning, while the Cushlon foam midsole offers soft and supportive comfort. The durable rubber outsole with waffle pattern delivers traction on various surfaces. These road running shoes are ideal for women seeking responsive and versatile footwear for their daily runs.
material: Engineered mesh upper with Flywire technology, Cushlon foam midsole, Rubber outsole
careInstructions: Spot clean with mild detergent, air dry

title: Ultra Fastpack IV Futurelight Hiking Shoes - Women's
shortDesc: Lightweight and breathable for fast-paced hikes.
desc: The North Face Ultra Fastpack IV Futurelight hiking shoes for women are designed for fast-paced hikes and trail runs. Constructed with Futurelight™ technology, the breathable and waterproof membrane keeps your feet dry and comfortable in various conditions. The Ultra Fastpack IV features a lightweight and responsive FastFoam™ midsole for cushioning and energy return, while the Vibram® Megagrip outsole provides durable traction on both wet and dry surfaces. These hiking shoes are ideal for women seeking lightweight and breathable footwear for fast-paced outdoor activities.
material: Futurelight™ upper, FastFoam™ midsole, Vibram® Megagrip outsole
careInstructions: Spot clean with mild detergent, air dry

title: Peakfreak X2 Outdry Hiking Shoes - Men's
shortDesc: Durable and versatile for all-day comfort on the trails.
desc: The Columbia Peakfreak X2 Outdry hiking shoes for men are built for durability and versatility on the trails. Featuring an Outdry™ waterproof and breathable membrane, these shoes keep your feet dry and comfortable in wet conditions. The Techlite™ midsole provides lightweight cushioning and support, while the Omni-Grip™ outsole delivers excellent traction on various terrains. The combination of suede, leather, and mesh upper offers durability and breathability. These hiking shoes are ideal for men who seek durable and versatile footwear for all-day comfort on the trails.
material: Suede, leather, and mesh upper, Techlite™ midsole, Omni-Grip™ outsole
careInstructions: Spot clean with mild detergent, air dry

title: Terrex Swift R3 Gore-Tex Hiking Shoes - Men's
shortDesc: Waterproof and agile for fast-paced hikes.
desc: The Adidas Terrex Swift R3 Gore-Tex hiking shoes for men are designed to provide waterproof protection and agility for fast-paced hikes. Featuring a breathable mesh upper with abrasion-resistant overlays, these shoes offer durability and support on the trails. The Gore-Tex membrane provides waterproof and breathable protection, while the Continental™ Rubber outsole offers reliable traction on wet and dry surfaces. The Lightstrike cushioning provides responsive comfort, making these shoes ideal for men seeking waterproof and agile footwear for their outdoor adventures.
material: Mesh upper with abrasion-resistant overlays, Gore-Tex membrane, Continental™ Rubber outsole
careInstructions: Spot clean with mild detergent, air dry

title: Targhee III Waterproof Mid Hiking Boots - Women's
shortDesc: Sturdy and waterproof for rugged trails.
desc: The Keen Targhee III Waterproof Mid hiking boots for women are designed to tackle rugged trails with confidence. Featuring a waterproof leather and performance mesh upper, these boots keep your feet dry and protected from the elements. The KEEN.DRY waterproof membrane provides breathable waterproofing, while the EVA midsole offers cushioned support and comfort. The multidirectional lug pattern on the outsole provides excellent traction on various surfaces, making these boots ideal for women who enjoy hiking in challenging terrain.
material: Leather and performance mesh upper, EVA midsole, Rubber outsole
careInstructions: Spot clean with mild detergent, air dry

title: Ghost 14 Road Running Shoes - Men's
shortDesc: Smooth and responsive for long-distance runs.
desc: The Brooks Ghost 14 road running shoes for men provide a smooth and responsive ride for long-distance runs. Featuring a breathable mesh upper with 3D Fit Print technology, these shoes offer a secure and adaptive fit. The DNA LOFT cushioning provides plush comfort and energy return, while the Segmented Crash Pad ensures smooth heel-to-toe transitions. The durable rubber outsole with Omega Flex Grooves offers flexibility and traction on the road. These road running shoes are ideal for men seeking comfort and performance during their long-distance runs.
material: Mesh upper with 3D Fit Print technology, DNA LOFT cushioning, Rubber outsole
careInstructions: Spot clean with mild detergent, air dry
additionalFeatures: DNA LOFT cushioning for plush comfort

title: Charged Bandit 6 Running Shoes - Women's
shortDesc: Lightweight and responsive for everyday runs.
desc: The Under Armour Charged Bandit 6 running shoes for women offer a lightweight and responsive ride for everyday runs. Featuring a breathable mesh upper with UA SpeedForm construction, these shoes provide a snug and comfortable fit. The Charged Cushioning® midsole absorbs impact and converts it into a responsive burst of energy, while the solid rubber outsole delivers durability and traction. These running shoes are ideal for women seeking a lightweight and responsive option for their daily runs.
material: Mesh upper with UA SpeedForm construction, Charged Cushioning® midsole, Rubber outsole
careInstructions: Spot clean with mild detergent, air dry
additionalFeatures: Charged Cushioning® for responsive energy return
